title: India loses World Cup, but local businesses win big as tourist spending soars by 400%
description: "From small businesses, local eateries, mom and-pop stores, budget hotels to luxury accommodations and fine-dining restaurants - the multiplier impact of the ICC World Cup on the Indian economy has been an all-round win, underscoring the importance of sporting and other major cultural events on local and national economies," said the report.
